detail_desc: Leather loafers with pointed toes and a tab across the front. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 4 cm.

Blouse in woven fabric with a decorative broderie anglaise pattern. Smocked stand-up collar, a small opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Set with a short-sleeved cotton shirt and matching bow tie, pair of shorts and a waistcoat woven in a linen blend. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets, and a fake welt back pocket. Waistcoat with buttons at the front. Bow tie in woven fabric with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Printed cargo jacket in washed cotton twill with appliqués, buttons and decorative shoulder tabs. Collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and flap chest and front pockets with a button. Lined.
Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, short, gently flared sleeves and smocking at the waist. Unlined.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with ribbing around the neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated, ribbed waist.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and a hairband in soft cotton. Longer top in sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a knot detail at the front.
Fitted jacket with jetted front pockets and no fasteners. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Push-up bra in lace with contrasting colour details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Leggings in a stretch cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a yoke front and back, short sleeves with print stripes and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length, tailored trousers in woven fabric with a hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases. Slits at the hems.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.
Brazilian briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Short, A-line skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and patch pockets. Lined.
Bikini top with a decorative knot detail and underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck and back.(Adjustable fastener at the back in sizes 36D-38B).

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave. Square neckline with decorative gathers at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Short puff sleeves with smocked hems, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and ties at the sides.
Ankle-length dungarees in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Top in soft, light sweatshirt fabric with a wide V-neck at the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with a sheen. Narrow, braided shoulder straps that cross at the back, a double-layered top with a braided trim, and an asymmetric hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Thin jacket in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs. Chest pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a zip at the back and decorative sparkly stone detailing at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Wide trousers in a soft weave with a high waist, detachable tie belt, concealed zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and side pockets.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs.

Pyjamas with a top and short shorts in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with a round neckline and long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked edges at the hems.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with short cap sleeves, a seam with a drawstring at the waist and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a bow on top.

Puffer jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and taped zip down the front. Side pockets with a taped zip, an inner pocket, ribbed cuffs and concealed, covered elastication at the hem. Polyester filling.

Short T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and wide, ribbed trim around the neckline. Loose fit with dropped shoulders, short balloon sleeves with elasticated hems, and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Trousers in a lightweight weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with pleats at the front of the neckline, an opening with a button at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Top in a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side, pleats at one side of the hem and a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem.
Short, gently fitted dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, concealed zip at the back, 3/4-length sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Fancy dress costume in soft pile with a hood and appliqués. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Long, metal earrings decorated with chiffon flowers and bead tassels. Length 13 cm.

Straight-style blouse in denim made from recycled cotton with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Cap with embroidery on the front, a contrasting colour cotton twill peak and concealed elastication at the back. Lined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and decorative knot detail at the front, low-cut back and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Gently fitted jacket in a linen and viscose blend with no lapels, a hook-and-eye fastening at the front, welt front pockets and 3/4-length, gathered sleeves. Lined.
Twill cap with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Fitted turtleneck top in jersey with long sleeves.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high, V-shaped waist with wide, gathered elastication. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. The polyamide content of the tights is partly recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in soft, extra-stretchy viscose jersey with smocking at the waist and long puff sleeves with gathers. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Fully lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
Lightly padded, quilted jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, and chest and front pockets with press-studs. Detachable belt at the waist. Lined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, lacing at the front and long sleeves with slits and a drawstring at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves, short legs and press-stud fastenings.
Playsuit in an airy weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated seam at the waist, short cap sleeves and short, wide legs with lace-trimmed hems. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved, V-neck nursing top in soft, ribbed jersey. Double-layered, wrapover front for easier nursing access.
Top in cotton piqué with long raglan sleeves, a small appliqué at the bottom and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sandals in imitation suede with decorative tassels at the top and a narrow heel strap that is elasticated at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Earrings in plastic and metal. Length approx. 5.3 cm.
Trousers in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and organic cotton blend. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, front pockets and wide, straight legs with narrow ribbing at the hems.
One-shoulder, knee-length dress in a cotton weave with narrow elastication and a wide flounced layer at the top. Detachable tie belt at the waist and lace embroidery at the hem. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini. Flounced top with narrow shoulder straps with a small metal decoration attached to one strap. Matching bottoms.
High-waisted jersey leggings.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist. Lined.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Imitation suede boots with a decorative buckle at one side, zip at the other and loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a cut-out section at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Trousers in softly draping satin with a slight sheen. High, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with sequins on the front, a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket.
